hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select a.cust_customer_code as external_Customer_Code, a.cust_customer_name as external_Customer_Name, a.ann_customer_code as customer_Code, a.ann_customer_name as customer_Name, a.plant_id as platform, b.cust_wh_code as external_Warehouse_Code, b.cust_wh_name as external_Warehouse_Name, b.wh_code as warehouse_Code, b.wh_name as warehouse_Name, b.company_code as company_Code, b.company_name as company_Name from mid_customer_control a inner join mid_site_wh_control b on a.cust_customer_code = b.customer_code where a.status = '0' and b.status = '0' <<and a.cust_customer_code = :externalCustomerCode>> <<and a.cust_customer_name = :externalCustomerName>> <<and a.ann_customer_code = :customerCode>> <<and a.ann_customer_name = :customerName>> <<and a.plant_id = :platform>> <<and b.cust_wh_code = :externalWarehouseCode>> <<and b.cust_wh_name = :externalWarehouseName>> <<and b.wh_code = :warehouseCode>> <<and b.wh_name = :warehouseName>> <<and b.company_code = :companyCode>> <<and b.company_name = :companyName>>
